name: resound
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to sound loudly or for a long time, or (of a place) to be filled with sound: The noise of the fire alarm resounded through/throughout the building. The concert hall resounded with cheers and applause. See also
resonate (MAKE SOUND)

Add to word list
Add to word list
to sound loudly or for a long time, or (of a place) to be filled with sound: The air resounds with the delightful music of birds.
